subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Diana Taurasi had 14 points on 6-of-7 shooting and 5 assists to help the U.S. women’s national team beat Senegal, 93-51, in Salamanca, Spain, in its final exhibition game before the world championship begins next week in the Czech Republic.
snippet: Diana Taurasi had 14 points on 6-of-7 shooting and 5 assists to help the U.S. women’s national team beat Senegal, 93-51, in Salamanca, Spain, in its final exhibition game before the world championship begins next week in the Czech Republic.
